summary: Completed testing of View Applicants with Enriched Creator Data feature. Backend: 9/11 tests passed (2 skipped due to rate limiting). Frontend: All UI elements verified - applicant cards display social accounts, level badges, stats grid, and status badges correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Backend endpoint /api/ugc/admin/campaigns/{campaign_id}/applications correctly returns enriched creator data
Frontend AdminCampaignManager.jsx correctly displays all enriched data fields
Social account links (Instagram/TikTok) open in new tab with target='_blank'
Level badges display with correct colors: rookie=gray, rising=blue, pro=purple
Stats grid shows rating, campaigns participated, avg views, avg interactions
Action buttons (Preseleccionar, Confirmar, Rechazar) correctly hidden for cancelled applications
data-testid attributes present on applicant cards for testing
seed_data_creation: Used existing campaign ID 18553c65-08d2-45f9-ac30-6bac89188c53 with 3 applications
context_for_next_testing_agent: View Applicants enriched data feature is fully functional. Backend endpoint: GET /api/ugc/admin/campaigns/{campaign_id}/applications. Frontend: AdminCampaignManager.jsx lines 1313-1565. Campaign with applications: 18553c65-08d2-45f9-ac30-6bac89188c53. All 3 applications have 'cancelled' status so action buttons won't appear.

admin_login.details: Admin can login with avenuepy@gmail.com and access UGC Campaign Manager

view_applicants_modal.details: Modal opens via clipboard icon button, shows campaign name, slots info, and applicant list

enriched_creator_data.details: Backend returns verified_instagram, verified_tiktok, campaigns_participated, avg_views, avg_reach, avg_interactions, avg_rating, total_reviews

social_accounts_display.details: Instagram link shows @username, follower count, verification badge. Opens in new tab. TikTok displays similarly when available.

level_badges.details: ROOKIE badge (gray), RISING badge (blue), PRO badge (purple) display correctly with uppercase text

stats_grid.details: 4-column grid shows: Rating (star icon), Campaigns (award icon), Avg Views (eye icon), Avg Interactions (trending icon)

action_buttons.details: Preseleccionar, Confirmar, Rechazar buttons appear for applied/shortlisted status. Hidden for cancelled applications.
